page.title: 18Upton Priory Junior School-1
page.content: The other school involved in The Domesday Project,for this area,is Upton Priory Junior School.The school is situated on the southern tip of the survey area,with the playing fields in the area. There are 180 children in the school,aged between seven and eleven years of age.There are seven classes in the school,and one other classroom which is used for school lessons,art and craft and music lessons.There is alot of musical activity in school, including an orchestra and a choir. There are several clubs including recorder groups,a guitar club,a Y.O.C. club,badminton and table tennis clubs, as well as the various sports teams. The school has its own P.T.A. Which has raised money for the school,buying items,such as,a video,a computer, books,P.E.equipment,etc.
